text: Jaanong polelo e e boammaaruri e, ke setshwantsho kaga ditsela tse pedi tsa Modimo tsa go thusa batho. Tsela e nngwe e ne e le go ba neela melao ya one gore ba e obamele. O dirile jaana mo Thabeng ya Senai, fa o neela Moshe Melao e e Some. Thaba ya Senai, kana tota, e bidiwa “Thaba ya Hagare” ka Searabia, mme mo setshwantshong se ke se ntshitseng mosadi wa ga Aberahame Hagare, wa lelata, o emetse Jerusalema, mma-motse wa Bajuta, modi wa tsela ele ya go leka go itumedisa Modimo ka go leka go obamela Melao; mme Bajuta, ba ba lekang go sala morago tsela eo, ke bana ba one ba batlhanka.
